item.title: 0733 | Hugo Terminal theme edit
item.description: code change themes > terminal > layouts > _default > index.html line 17 added .ByTitle.Reverse ran hugo to update. No errors. Now adding some extra posts without dates eg 733 and 622. It didn’t work, so back to date invention. #Experiment? It may be worth an experiment! Using the no theme setup, move the posts into there. At least with the simplified approach things can be tried out. Given that a refresh is needed which wasn’t done, it may be worth repeating the exercise…
